original_title: Long Time A Girl: An Endless City Adventure
overview: Driven by an insatiable thirst for knowledge, TicToc, 35, created a revolutionary principle for traveling through time: temportals. By going through them, he can see the world at decisive moments in the development of mankind. By garnering the long-gone wisdom of the greatest geniuses in history, TicToc hopes to solve the environmental problems of his time: 2040. However, MMM, the company he works for, wants to use it for commercial purposes, creating even more environmental damage. TicToc has no choice than sabotaging his own work, but MMM sends its Chickadees (time travelers) to stop him. To escape, TicToc will travel through time, meeting long-lost relatives having a crucial role in his mission...
title: Long Time A Girl: An Endless City Adventure
